title: Les Cousins de 'la Constance': Episode 2
description: In order to gather finances to buy 'La Constance', the Guillous have to sell shares in their fishing business to local villagers. They are still working hard at convincing Mother Guillou to sell her treasured land to make up for the short fall. Meanwhile, Yves and Marie-Josee are moving their abode to the basement. The Summer season has arrived and the whole house is rented out to the family of a Parisian doctor.  Credits: Producer, Marcel Degliame Fouche ; director, Robert Mazoyer ; writer, Paul Guimard ; photography, Jean-Jacques Guyard ; music, Georges Delerue. Cast: Jean Le Mouel, Claude Brosset, Lucien Barjon, Andree Tainsy, Jean-Marc Epinoux, Dominique Mac Avoy, Elina Labourdette, Jean-Pierre Kerien, Catherine Seynes.
